#summary Why it's slow
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

We use RFCOMM/BT SPP and 8N1 38400 baud, but this can be changed. (http://archive.is/4Gcr3)

= Details =

To increase rate to 3686400 baud:
try:
    self.lock.acquire()
    self.ser.write('\x84\x01\x0c\x00\x08')
finally:
    self.lock.release()
